name: Ghosted (7fault Dev Team)
description:
Ghosted is a puzzle platformer with an interesting twist - when you die, your character keeps repeating the life in which it died, following the same path and dying again and again, until you change its environment (using your ghost form) and enable it to live and use a new path. 

It was created by a team of four over 4 weeks with a gamejam like format (theme and constraints), on the theme 'Not yet dead' (Pas encore mort).
These four are Alexandre Rongier, Aymane Kassim, Gabriel Rochab and Xavier Clavel.
